title: League ingame keeps freezing !
body:
Hello Riot,

For the past few days now my league in game has started to freeze at random points. It happens for about 10-20 seconds and then goes away, but it happens at multiple points in the game randomly. Sometime it even happens in the client and freezes up my whole pc. When it freezes in game everything else in the background works such as Discord. I am positive that I have updated drivers. Please any help would be appreciated

Here are my specs

Windows 7 64 bit
AMD fx-4300 - 3.8 ghz
AMD radeon r7 200 processor
8 gb ram

replies.body: Thats kind of a bullsht, i have updated everything,checked my connection it is fine and im getting freezes all the time and not only for 20 sec .When i play an aram it can keep like that the whole game the champs are flashing around on my screem like i have 2 k lag ( but i dont have)....so what is the issue here? I dont know seriously.
